feed.title: Fwd: bitcoin scope issue in main.cpp

entry.title: Fwd: bitcoin scope issue in main.cpp
entry.summary: In an email forwarded to laanwj at gmail.com, Dean Gores identifies a bitcoin scope issue in main.cpp, specifically in the AcceptToMemoryPool function. He notes that "i" and "output" are declared in the same scope, providing the offending code snippet as evidence. Gores mentions that this issue is within a disabled feature, indicating that it may not be critical.
